mapper.select: select id, task_name, store_selection_type, user_range_type, task_type, affiliated_company_type, quantity_allotted, execution_mode, script_content, task_objective_ratio, task_start_time, task_end_time, return_visit_result, status, create_time, update_time from task_management where id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into task_management(task_name, store_selection_type, user_range_type, task_type, affiliated_company_type, quantity_allotted, execution_mode, script_content, task_objective_ratio, task_start_time, task_end_time, return_visit_result, status, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.taskName}, #{entity.storeSelectionType}, #{entity.userRangeType}, #{entity.taskType}, #{entity.affiliatedCompanyType}, #{entity.quantityAllotted}, #{entity.executionMode}, #{entity.scriptContent}, #{entity.taskObjectiveRatio}, #{entity.taskStartTime}, #{entity.taskEndTime}, #{entity.returnVisitResult}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into task_management(task_name, store_selection_type, user_range_type, task_type, affiliated_company_type, quantity_allotted, execution_mode, script_content, task_objective_ratio, task_start_time, task_end_time, return_visit_result, status, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.taskName}, #{entity.storeSelectionType}, #{entity.userRangeType}, #{entity.taskType}, #{entity.affiliatedCompanyType}, #{entity.quantityAllotted}, #{entity.executionMode}, #{entity.scriptContent}, #{entity.taskObjectiveRatio}, #{entity.taskStartTime}, #{entity.taskEndTime}, #{entity.returnVisitResult}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update task_name = values(task_name), store_selection_type = values(store_selection_type), user_range_type = values(user_range_type), task_type = values(task_type), affiliated_company_type = values(affiliated_company_type), quantity_allotted = values(quantity_allotted), execution_mode = values(execution_mode), script_content = values(script_content), task_objective_ratio = values(task_objective_ratio), task_start_time = values(task_start_time), task_end_time = values(task_end_time), return_visit_result = values(return_visit_result), status = values(status), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time)
mapper.update:
update task_management
task_name = #{taskName},
store_selection_type = #{storeSelectionType},
user_range_type = #{userRangeType},
task_type = #{taskType},
affiliated_company_type = #{affiliatedCompanyType},
quantity_allotted = #{quantityAllotted},
execution_mode = #{executionMode},
script_content = #{scriptContent},
task_objective_ratio = #{taskObjectiveRatio},
task_start_time = #{taskStartTime},
task_end_time = #{taskEndTime},
return_visit_result = #{returnVisitResult},
status = #{status},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
